name: The Endless Archive: The Full Archive
name_original: The Endless Archive: The Full Archive
description:
My name is Peter. I archived this old game by Angelstorm Interactive Studios ( Angelstorm Interactive or Angelstorm Studios for short.  ). Angelstorm Studios Interactive, according to my friend, Autumn, was a small studio consisting of her friendgroup. They made RPG Maker games and published them to their website. However, things went downhill and they shut down. About the archive.. it is pirated. I tried my best to remove the anti piracy, though.  After I downloaded the archive, the website shut down. So I couldn't archive much else, I have more archived stuff but I will likely not publish it unless if I am asked. The password needed that was in the manual is "32431".

Non-ARG stuff:

TRIGGER WARNING: suicide, abuse, mildly bad language

Plug-in credits: SumRnDde, Yanfly Engine, Felski, and GALV
